article_title: Boeing Predicts More Orders For 777X Aircraft From Middle East
article_text:
FARNBOROUGH, England—Boeing Co. predicts Emirates Airline and Eithad Airways could order a further 175 777X aircraft to bolster their fleets for growth, as the Gulf airlines continue to expand into new markets and add capacity on major routes into the next decade.

Dubai-based Emirates last week confirmed its order for 150 777X in a deal valued at $56 billion at list prices, and holds purchase rights for an additional 50 777X jets....
